job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: Who We ArebrbrEnhance IT is an ITManagement firm that specializes in training placement and IT consultation We are an industry leader in providing toplevel skilled and experienced consultants in a variety of technologies to meet our client s needs in today s fast paced environmentbrbrWhat you will be doingbrbrYou will be joining our cuttingedge development team as it grows We want individuals who are comfortable asking why The ideal candidate for this role is motivated energized and has a creative thought process They are a team player possessing strong analytical as well as technical skills and are able to communicate the logic behind technical decisions to nontech stakeholders They must be comfortable working in an agile environment and have the ability to take the wheel when necessarybrbrWhat you need for this positionbrbrAn objectoriented programming language such as Java C or Kotlin or C or objective C or PythonbrbrSound understanding of the entire Software Development LifecyclebrbrStrong knowledge of Software Design Patterns data structures and best practicesbrbrBachelors degree in Computer Science Computer Engineering Information Systems or related fieldbrbrStrong written and verbal communication skillsbrbrAvailability to travel and live in the USbrbrBonus pointsbrbrHands on experiencebrbrdeveloping software with Agile Scrum or Kanban methodologiesbrbrinteracting with REST Web APIs XML or Jsonbrbrusing a VCS like Git or SVNbrbrworking with third party libraries for Java using Maven or GradlebrbrstronguAdditional Criteria SkillsbrbrustrongHands on experience withbrbrSoftware Testing using tools like JUnit and MockitobrbrSoftware Integration tools like JIRA Jenkins
